reviews.review:
Welcome to Aperture Laboratories, our facilities where science gets done because we do what we must (because we can). This little puzzle game from Valve packs a huge punch for an experimental inclusion in the compilation set The Orange Box.
You are an unnamed lady test subject, #-----, and have been awakened from your stasis pod in your Relaxation Vault. The source of your awakening is an overly preppy sounding AI (GLaDOS) who sarcastically 'hopes your brief detention was a pleasant one' and you are to go through the Enrichment Centre. This is a series of test chambers, you start in 00, which contain puzzles and are to complete a total of 19 puzzle rooms which gradually increase in difficulty as more elements get added to each room. Your 'learning' is aided by a radio pumping out an upbeat version of Sill Alive, a series of cubes (including the companion cube) and the infamous Portal gun.
Each room at the entrance contains a board with symbols giving your foresight into the puzzles which lay ahead and a customer service veiled couldn't care less style of commentary about your progress and the Enrichment Centre (the taste of blood being a perfectly normal side effect). GLaDOS clearly functions on sarcasm, lies/ manipulation and suspicious break downs in the middle of sentences.

This streamlined, linear level design is cleverly hidden behind a stark scientific cleanliness and minimalist setting. The various shades of grey are seen all over the facility, with blues and oranges peppered about the give life the bleak locations. I like the fogged windows in each of the testing chambers where you can see observation rooms full of equipment behind them and the various cameras all over, it gives the unsettling feeling of being constantly watched and judged. The rare glimpses of your character through the portals gives an interesting hint to the setting, you can see a bright orange jumpsuit and devices attached to your legs for enhanced movement around the facilities. I really like how you have to piece together the background to this game through the sparse hints you pick up during the game and how they aren't necessary to have a brilliant time.
To add to the spartan setting most of the sounds you hear are either GLaDOS speaking to you ore the radio, it creates a feeling of isolation and being separated from other humans.

What I appreciate the most is the addition of bonus maps and challenge maps, which add an extra layer of difficulty to the base game. It gives both repeatability to the game and provides more for those who are seeking greater challenges. 

This is a must play; you go around solving puzzles at the whim of a snarky and psychotic AI, who has a pitch black sense of humour. What more is there to love?
O bolo é uma mentira. = (
Bellissimo gioco di intelligenza, originale, grafica eccezionale, e strappa un sacco di risate. La trama è quasi assente, ma è meglio così: mi è piaciuto lasciare tutto all'immaginazione.
Great playthrough and character dialouge. Advanced levels and challenges add to overall game value.
Woaw qui aurait cru qu'il y aurait un tel scénario dans un jeu qui commence comme ca ? Par contre il est court, un peu moins de 4h pour le finir
This game came with the "Orange Box". I thought I would just play for a few minutes. 5 hours later I was at the games ending. Very Addicting, very fun! 10/10
Addicted...if only it didn't make me nauseous...must learn...moderation.
For science, you monster
A short, yet very addictive and fun story mode. The game made me laugh numerable times, so that's a big + as well :D

1. Very unique and engaging puzzle gameplay mechanics
2. Comedic yet serious and involving single player campaign
3. Replayability with various challenges
4. The cake is a lie
Originale, coinvolgente, lascia il segno per la sua apparente semplicità. Uno dei videogiochi più innovativi degli ultimi anni.
I shouldn't have to recommend this... This game is simply amazing. One of the best ever made.

Juego muy entretenido. Los puzzles de cada nivel hace que pienses todo antes de lanzar el primer portal. La historia también vale la pena. Lo mejor es que no hay una sóla forma de resolver el puzzle y avanzar al siguiente nivel, sino que cada vez descubres algo que no viste antes. Una vez que acabas el juego no quiere decir que se acaba la diversión.
The must-be-played puzzle game! Ofc, there is a lot more to it, you should play it yourself to see its magic :)
Egoshooter meets Puzzle. Genialst!
A Classic! Great game that isn't too long.
Simples, inteligente e desafiador. Um dos melhores jogos dos últimos anos, sem sombra de dúvida

This is a great game that really gets your mind jogging. The puzzles in this game are well crafted and often times frustrating, but it is rewarding to get through it and reach the end of the very odd story line. Though this game may be old, it is a classic.
The cake is a lie. The fun is not.

Ce jeu est purement et simplement un must, surtout si vous aimez devoir réflechir un minimum en jouant a un jeu tout en écoutant quelques bon mots d'humour d'une machine qui ne pense qu'a vous tuer, n'hésitez plus et offrer vous les deux épisodes de Portal. Maniabilitée et rapidité au top sans oublier l'humour de l'oeil infernal qui ne manqueras jamais une occasion de se fouttre de votre poire :D . 
Surtout que ce jeux est intégralement disponible (son vidéo et texte) en français.

Excelente game! Idéia bastante simples mas muito bem executada, se você procura um bom jogo de puzzles, essa série é só alegria! Há alguns defeitos que são percebidos quando se joga o sucessor, fora isso, é must-buy! Peca um pouco na duração.

PROs: Idéia simples e bem executada, puzzles de boa dificuldade, personagens carismáticos.

CONTRAs: Algumas deficiencias no gameplay (que foram melhoradas no segundo game), história pouco explorada, curta duração.

Portal has a great story and innovative game design. Revoluntionary in fact. This game lacks content for now but pay close attention to upcoming Portal 2 and 3 as they will boast more interactive innovations. 

8.5/10 RATING!
Концептуальный, математически выверенный шедевр. Так должен был выглядеть Prey, если бы у его авторов было больше таланта и смелости. К тому же это первая игра, где вы можете встать себе на голову.
The bets game of Valve exept Half- Life series
If you haven't played this or even SEEN, you've missed a lot. I know I did.
It is Portal, go buy it.
Muy buen juego de puzzle. Muy entretenido y original (también en el apartado gráfico). Para mi gusto demasiado corto y me esperaba los retos más difíciles, pero aún así muy recomendable.
Старый добрый Портал, что тут сказать. :)

Este juego es excelente.
Toda aquella persona que lo Juegue no se va a Arrepentir de haberlo Jugado.

Espero de todo corazón Que exista portal 3, Ya que esta saga, esta buenísima!

Fun and challenging. GlaDOs and the turrets may be the only characters that talk, but they are just so appealing.
awesomeness is awesome
Don't really need to say anything..

Great game. If is not a classic its going to be.

Portal is one of those games that have a good story line to it but if you know what to do it can be a really quick story line. Not to much else to say about the game.
Excellent tout simplement
Both first and second game are excellent. Really really good puzzles and a great deal of fun (especially the second game is hilarious).
A very fun game nedd to thinking to play this. 7/10
If you haven't played this game yet, you're... i dunno..... just play the damn game! it's awesome!

Qu'est-ce que c'est que ce jeu ?! Voilà ma première impression... Petit à petit, le piège se referme et vous vous retrouvez 3h30 plus tard en train de finir le jeu, avec une petite larme au moment de la fin en vous disant que cette belle aventure est fini... Ou pas. Son principal défaut, je vous l'ai cité au-dessus; le jeu se finit relativement vite, environ 3 à 4 heures pour voir la fin de cette superbe aventure.
An amazing game. I'm completely obsessed with it.
Amazing game. Fun story very immersive :)
The caek is a lie.
this game is amazing, but it's a little harder if you can't properly think with portals
jogo muito bom porem o 2 e melhor
bra
Great game. A must try.

The original. Fantastic game! Innovative for its time and an absolute gem. Community content keeps it interesting and the challenges will pose difficulty for even the most seasoned players of the franchise. If you like puzzles, platformers, indie games, or really anything, I highly recommend playing Portal. It's phenomenal and the second builds off the first with even more mystery, intrigue, friendships, and challenge. Get it. Play it. Love it.
Not sure who wouldn't already have this one.  Its too cheap and good to not get it.  Heck its even free at times.  Get it.  (10/10)
Jeu horriblement prenant. 16/20
I love this game, it needs you to think in order to play!
<3 Valve

Pas de Portal 2 sans Portal.
Un jeu simple mais bien conçu et tellement prenant.
( Une attention particulière à été porté à la voix et aux dialogues de GlaDOS, qui mérite d'être écouté en VO pour en profiter un maximum )
Inovou com esse estilo inteligente de fazer jogos. Muito bom.

Un juego que se aparta completamente de todo lo que hayas visto antes y que inicia una saga genial (además de proceder de una de las sagas más míticas como es Half Life). Si todavía no has jugado tienes que hacerlo.
Cake is a lie. ;DDDDDDDDDD
Очень хорошая игра=)

Probably a really old game for most of you but I've only played a couple hours after getting it alongside Portal 2 for less than 7 bucks and it put my worn-out intelligence to the test. Also good for people unfortunate enough to be gaming on a laptop like me where you can't run every game with good performance since it works fine with high settings albeit some stretching depending on your card (I had the same problem with The Sims 3 but it had a fix, so this one might too). This game gets the job done especially for its cost and in these times. Have yet to try out Portal 2 since I need to turn my settings a bit farther down for that...
A must-have, nothing more.
Win.
The cake is a lie!
An amazing game, with a great story and great puzzles. A must have!

Brilliant puzzle, full of pretty minimalistic design, intelligent sense of humor and a perfect balance between complexity and accessibility. If there is a game that will appeal to everyone, regardless of their tastes and preferences,  it is undoubtedly the Portal.

Шутер, котором никого не надо убивать. Ну, почти.
Очень напомнил оригинальных Half-Life: появился тот же исследовательский интерес  "а что там дальше?", "что это за комната?", "а сюда можно пробраться?".
Хорошая игра, в чём-то продолжающая традиции The Incredible Machine.
Excellent game!

I’m making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.

Mandatory playing for everyone.
A very great game that will put your puzzle-solving skills to the test!

Resultat d'une rencontre entre le classicisme et l'originalité, Portal est une de ces oeuvres vidéoludiques qui, basé sur un concept des plus ordinaire, sont capable de nous faire vivre une expérience extraordinaire. Un chef d'oeuvre.

At this point, we've all heard of Portal.  We all know the plotline.  We all know the song John Coulton wrote for this game.  So I won't add anything.

However, in case you haven't heard, the cake is totally a lie.

Si "Portal" no existiera, habria que crearlo...

Es una obra maestra, simple y llanamente. Lo digo enserio... este juego deberia venir de serie instalado en todos los SO.

Muito bom. Mistura puzzle com FPS, além de ter uma história realmente instigante (apesar de não parecer no início). O único ponto fraco do jogo é que ele é bastante curto, o que é compensado pelos desafios. Recomendo.

Interestingly enough, the first few lines of the song in the end credits of the game succinctly summarize my feelings about Portal:

♪ This was a triumph ♪
♪ I'm making a note here: huge success ♪
♪ It's hard to overstate my satisfaction ♪
Cake is a Lie ;)

"Once they calm down from the high of Team Fortress 2, they won't know what hit them!" is what I imagine a Valve employee saying when they snuck the then unknown Portal into the Orange Box.

Well, you wouldn't be reading this if you don't know what Portal is, was, or has become. Without a doubt, one of the most important games in Valve's deck of cards and it certainly has earned a spot in the hearts of many. 

Physics-based puzzle-shooter that's worth gloating about. Dark humour that will make you question your own, and a story that keeps you guessing and wanting more. The only thing this game doesn't have is an iPad app tie-in offering free TF2 hates to thos whom own the titles originally on Steam*. If you don't have this game already, get it!

*Copyright idea Valve. You're welcome to it, but at least give me some free hats! :)
If you have not played this game yet, you are the opposite of Batman.
